title: 10 Steps to Self-Esteem
description: From 25 years of professional and clinical experience working to empower individuals, Darlene Lancer, JD, MFT, has written the ultimate guide to overcoming self-criticism. Raising self-esteem is the most effective way to overcome codependency, and self-criticism is the single biggest destroyer of self-esteem. 10 Steps to Self-Esteem is both comprehensive and concise, outlined in an easy form to remember, both 1-10 and A-J. This 27-page ebook is packed full of practical suggestions and exercises in each step that you can do on your own.
author: Darlene Lancer
